content: scattered mama hat pattern sizing young child adult materials worsted weight yarn i used one skein of noro kureyon for the hat above size g &h hook guage rounds 1 - 4 of pattern equals 4 diameter with h hook chain 3 and join to first chain with a slip_stitch to form ring 1 chain 3 counts as first double_crochet throughout 7 double_crochet in ring join with a slip stitch to top of chain 3 2 chain 3 *2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat * to * around double_crochet in same st as joining join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 16 double_crochet 3 repeat round 2 32 double_crochet 4 chain 3 double_crochet in the next 2 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch * double_crochet in the next 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch * repeat * to * around join with a slip stitch to top of chain 3 40 double_crochet 5 chain 3 double_crochet in the next 3 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch *double_crochet in the next 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch * repeat * to * around join with a slip stitch to top of chain 3 48 double_crochet 6 for adult only child go directly to round 7 chain 3 double_crochet in the next 4 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch *double_crochet in the next 5 stitches 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat * to * around join with a slip_stitch to top of chain 3 56 double_crochet 7 chain 3 *skip next stitch 2 double_crochet in the next stitch* repeat * to * around one double_crochet in same stitch as joining from previous round join with a slip stitch to top of chain 3 48 56 double_crochet 8 slip_stitch in space between first 2 double_crochet chain 3 *2 double_crochet in the space between the next 2 double_crochet* repeat * to * around then double_crochet in same space as chain 3 space from beginning 48 56 double_crochet 9 repeat round 8 for 5 10 more rounds 10 using smaller hook *single_crochet in first stitch skip next stitch 5 double_crochet in next stitch* repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to first stitch finish off for personal use only you can purchase more copies for friends or family at www crazyhatlady com please do not redistribute your copy if you
